name.baseName: Foundation constriction ; Tower foundation of a 1.5 MW wind turbine
基础的建设 ; 1.5 MW 风轮机铁塔基础

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The data set describes the construction phase for the tower foundation of a 1.5 MW wind turbine. This process data is specifically applicable to the manufacturing stage of wind farms where environmental impacts (e.g., energy consumption and emissions) are analyzed. The case study focuses on a wind farm in Inner Mongolia with domestic wind turbines, relevant for renewable energy projects and large-scale wind power installations in similar climatic and geographical regions.
该数据集描述了1.5兆瓦风力发电机铁塔基础的建设阶段。该过程数据专门适用于制造风力发电场的阶段，在这个阶段将分析环境影响（例如，能源消耗和排放）。案例研究侧重于内蒙古的风电场和国产风力涡轮机，适用于类似气候和地理区域的可再生能源项目和大规模风电装置。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The functional unit is 1.5 MW wind turbine

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The data regarding the parameters of wind power has been collected from Wang (2012). A wind farm equipped with 33 domestic 1.5 megawatts (MW) wind turbines is regarded as a case study to analyze the environmental impact and its substitution effects. The wind farm is located in the northeast of Inner Mongolia, the province in which most of China’s wind power is installed (Xia and Song, 2017).
风电功率参数的数据来自Wang ( 2012 )。以装有33台国产1.5兆瓦( MW )风电机组的风电场为案例，分析其环境影响及其替代效应。该风电场位于我国风电装机最多的省份- -内蒙古东北部。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The data set describes the construction phase for the tower foundation of a 1.5 MW wind turbine. This process data is specifically applicable to the manufacturing stage of wind farms where environmental impacts (e.g., energy consumption and emissions) are analyzed. The case study focuses on a wind farm in Inner Mongolia with domestic wind turbines, relevant for renewable energy projects and large-scale wind power installations in similar climatic and geographical regions.
该数据集描述了1.5兆瓦风力发电机铁塔基础的建设阶段。该过程数据专门适用于制造风力发电场的阶段，在这个阶段将分析环境影响（例如，能源消耗和排放）。案例研究侧重于内蒙古的风电场和国产风力涡轮机，适用于类似气候和地理区域的可再生能源项目和大规模风电装置。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: The life cycle inventory for wind power is illustrated as follows. The production and manufacturing stage include the production of wind turbines, substations, and cables, which consume a large amount of energy and emit pollutants (Xue et al., 2015).
风电的生命周期清单如下所示。生产制造阶段包括风电机组、变电站、电缆的生产，这些设备消耗大量能源，排放污染物( Xue et al . , 2015)。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data regarding the parameters of wind power has been collected from Wang (2012). A wind farm equipped with 33 domestic 1.5 megawatts (MW) wind turbines is regarded as a case study to analyze the environmental impact and its substitution effects. The wind farm is located in the northeast of Inner Mongolia, the province in which most of China’s wind power is installed (Xia and Song, 2017).
风电功率参数的数据来自Wang ( 2012 )。以装有33台国产1.5兆瓦( MW )风电机组的风电场为案例，分析其环境影响及其替代效应。该风电场位于我国风电装机最多的省份- -内蒙古东北部。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Li, H., Jiang, H.-D., Dong, K.-Y., Wei, Y.-M. & Liao, H. A comparative analysis of the life cycle environmental emissions from wind and coal power: Evidence from China. Journal of Cleaner Production 248, 119192 (2020).

Li, H., Jiang, H.-D., Dong, K.-Y., Wei, Y.-M. & Liao, H. A comparative analysis of the life cycle environmental emissions from wind and coal power: Evidence from China. Journal of Cleaner Production 248, 119192 (2020).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users of this data set must take into account the geographical and technological specificities of the wind farm in Inner Mongolia when applying the data to other scenarios. It is imperative to consider the methodological implications of the localized environmental impacts and the substitution effects compared to other energy sources. The life cycle inventory should be used when assessing the environmental performance of similar wind turbine projects, ensuring adjustments for regional energy mixes and technology variations.
使用此数据集的用户在将数据应用于其他场景时，必须考虑内蒙古风电场的地理和技术特性。与其他能源相比，考虑本地化环境影响和替代效果的方法学含义是必须的。在评估类似风力涡轮机项目的环境性能时，应使用生命周期清单，确保对区域能源组合和技术变化进行调整。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
